attributes.action: introduce the death penalty for misconduct as an MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems self evident that all MPs who misappropriation funds from the public or in some other way commit serious misconduct in a public office ought to forfeit their lives. After all, as representatives of the state, they ultimately hold powers of life and death over the people; thus this ought to be balanced through reciprocation of said powers in permitting the people to put any corrupt Members of Parliament to death.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
